koinbisnisTop.heading-label: Boost Your Business Growth to the Next Level
koinbisnisTop.description: Whatever type of business you are running, we believe that it has every potential needed to grow. Get up to IDR2 billion non-collateral business loans with instant approval from KoinBisnis and grow even further.
koinbisnisTop.arready-accountLink: (Only for Borrowers who have registered before December 10, 2019)

koinbisnisPoint.descriptionOne: With monthly interest rate ranged from 0.75% – 1.67%, you can get business financing to grow your sales up to Rp 2 billion. No hidden fee.
koinbisnisPoint.descriptionTwo: You don’t need to input your requirement document manually. We connect your bank statement and your online shop for quick loan approval.
koinbisnisPoint.descriptionThree: With our artificial intelligence and machine learning technology, we can give you approve your loan faster than conventional institutions.
koinbisnisPoint.descriptionFour: Don ‘t worry about the costs! We ensure that you only pay the interest rate and fees based on the credit scoring and of course with your approval.

koinbisnisWhy.heading: Accessible & Affordable Business Financing
koinbisnisWhy.descriptionOne: With our artificial intelligent technology we can approve your loan from one day to three days, right into your account.
koinbisnisWhy.descriptionTwo: You don’t need credit cards, property, or any other physical things to be collateral. We just need legal documentation and financial report.
koinbisnisWhy.descriptionThree: We provide a loan repayment period of 6 – 24 months that you can adjust to your business performance or needs
koinbisnisWhy.descriptionFour: You can pay of your installment earlier than the tenor with no penalty fee. And, you can always reapply for another loan afterwards.
koinbisnisWhy.descriptionFive: You can transfer the repayment right into your bank virtual account on KoinWorks and monitor if we have received your payment via app.
koinbisnisWhy.descriptionSix: We are monitored and registered on OJK, so we will obey the OJK rules about credit collection procedure.

koinbisnisHowWorks.heading: How KoinBisnis Works
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-One: Borrower applies for a loan online via the app.
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-Two: KoinWorks assesses the data and classifies the credit scores into five main tiers, from A – E.
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-Three: The loan will then be issued into the marketplace.
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-Four: Lenders assess the detailed information about the loan, decide and start funding it.
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-Five: Loan is fully funded and disbursed into the Borrower’s assigned bank account.
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-Six: The Borrower starts using it and pay monthly installments.
koinbisnisHowWorks.description-Seven: KoinWorks system automatically distributes returns to Lenders based on the portion of their funding (Principal + Interest).
